name: riotaex
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0

stmt.origin: eqeltri(crio(s0, c0, w0), universe, cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
stmt.pretty: eqeltri(iota(s0 ∈ c0, w0), universe, iota(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)))

body.origin:
|- wcel(crio(s0, c0, w0), universe)

-| wcel(cio(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), universe)

⊢ iota(s0 ∈ c0, w0)∈ 𝕌
⊣ iota(s0 ∈ c0, w0)= iota(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
⊣ iota(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))∈ 𝕌
